Articles.Content:
So I have these dark textures in the SPH and VAB in the parts menu. Note its not completely black, just dark. I have tried restarting KSP, uninstalling/reinstalling KSP, verifying game files and updating all my mods. nothing. 

Here is a screenshot. 

https://1drv.ms/u/s!AnIoa_S7QMYb2HsPtFPFZKBdGdOL?e=QNTxZi
Turn your ambient light in VAB to 0 or 100%. You currently have it as -100%.
